newsitem.title: USA: Budget to buy Ohio-based Premier Car Rental.
newsitem.headline: Budget to buy Ohio-based Premier Car Rental.

text.p: Budget Group Inc said Wednesday it plans to acquire Cleveland, Ohio-based Premier Car Rental Inc with 1996 revenues of $61 million.
The company said the acquisition is not expected to affect 1997 earnings, and will be slighlty additive in 1998.
Terms of the purchase were not disclosed. A Budget Group spokeswoman said the acquisition is expected to close in August.
Budget said Premier will continue to operate as its own brand in the insurance replacement market. It has a network of 101 locations in 13 U.S. markets, and 9,000 cars.

The company said it believes a significant number of vehicles in its Budget Rent A Car fleet could be transferred to Premier locations before being sent to Budget Car Sales facilities. This will reduce monthly depreciation costs, the company said.
Budget has more than 3,200 airport and local market rental locations in more than 120 countries and territories.
